snippet: In Steve Jobs’s efforts to reshape the high-tech industry, he gained a reputation for making often cutting comments about competitors and to his own staff.
lead_paragraph: In Steve Jobs’s efforts to reshape the high-tech industry, he gained a reputation for making often cutting comments about competitors and to his own staff.

headline.main: Defending Life’s Work With Words of a Tyrant
headline.print_headline: Moving On, Minus Its Genius: Defending Life’s Work With Words Of a Tyrant
headline.seo: Steve Jobs Defended His Work With a Barbed Tongue
